nodes.text: Force Dash, also known as Force Speed, was an ability of the Force that allowed its user to increase their speed for a brief time. The increased speed of the Force-user enabled the individual to perceive and react the world and the entities around them in slow motion, allowing them to dodge attacks easily and attack more quickly with greater accuracy.
With sufficient skill in Force Dash, users were able to run on vertical surfaces for brief periods of time, an ability the Jedi Jocasta Nu had.

While aboard the Trade Federation starship Saak'ak, Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi used Force Dash to escape from droidekas. Darth Sidious, a Dark Lord of the Sith, was also capable of utilizing Force Dash. The Second Sister could move to greater speeds, and she was able to dodge incoming blaster bolts.
